title: Mexico Cross-Border Logistics Security
metaTitle: Mexico Cargo Security Solution | Anti-Theft AI MDVR System
metaDesc: Secure your cross-border fleet in Mexico with real-time AI surveillance. Prevent cargo theft, ensure driver safety, and simplify insurance claims.

blocks.title: Fortify Your Fleet Against Cargo Theft
blocks.subtitle: Navigate Mexico's high-risk routes with confidence. Our AI-powered MDVR system provides 24/7 visibility and instant alerts to stop theft before it happens.

items.title: Rest Stop Cargo Theft
items.desc: Freight trucks are highly vulnerable to organized theft during mandatory rest breaks or overnight stops in unsecure areas.

items.title: Driver Safety Threats
items.desc: Drivers face violent hijackings and assaults. Without a discreet SOS system, they cannot safely call for immediate assistance.

items.title: High-Risk Driving Behaviors
items.desc: Fatigue and distraction on monotonous cross-border routes increase the risk of severe rollovers and collision accidents.

items.title: Lack of Liability Evidence
items.desc: In the event of theft or an accident, missing video evidence leads to rejected insurance claims and lengthy legal disputes.

items.title: Fuel Siphoning Risk
items.desc: Fuel theft is rampant on long-haul routes. Unmonitored fuel tanks lead to significant operational losses and delays.

items.title: Delayed Incident Response
items.desc: Without real-time alerts, fleet managers often learn about hijackings hours too late to coordinate with local police.

blocks.caption: Real-time AI monitoring for secure cross-border operations.

items.title: Real-Time AI Surveillance
items.desc: Detect unauthorized access to cargo or fuel tanks instantly. AI cameras trigger local sirens and stream video to HQ immediately.

items.title: Covert SOS Alarm
items.desc: A hidden panic button allows drivers to silently alert the command center during a hijacking without notifying the assailants.

items.title: Cloud Evidence Lock
items.desc: Critical event footage (collisions, SOS) is automatically uploaded and locked in the cloud, ensuring it cannot be tampered with.

items.title: Remote Immobilization
items.desc: Safely cut off the engine remotely via the dashboard if a vehicle is confirmed stolen, preventing it from crossing the border.

items.title: Driver Behavior Monitoring
items.desc: AI-powered DMS detects fatigue and phone use, issuing real-time voice alerts to keep drivers focused on dangerous routes.

items.title: Fuel Theft Detection
items.desc: Monitor fuel levels in real-time. Abrupt drops trigger instant alarms to prevent siphoning during rest stops.

items.title: D604 4-Channel AI MDVR

items.title: AI Driver Guardian (ADAS/DMS)
items.desc: Proactively warns drivers of fatigue, distraction, and phone use. Preventing accidents before they occur on long, monotonous highways.
